page.title: 19DAY IN THE LIFE, W. KILBRIDE
page.content: Most mornings I{wake up}at 7.30 a.m. (Sometimes I need a little help.) I wash, get dressed, brush my teeth and then have breakfast. Then I get ready for{school. }Our first activity in school is to discuss any items of news or interest. After this we move on to Language work and Maths. In the afternoon we might work on History, Social Studies, Science, Physical Education, Computer Studies or anything else which crops up. School finishes at 3.35 p.m. {In the evening I might go to a club like the chess club, or go to the Cubs, Brownies, Scouts or Girl Guides. If none of these is on and the weather is fine, I might go{out to play}with my friends. (Any homework from school is normally done before tea.) If the weather is not good I will usually watch {television}or a{video}until bedtime.
